Cairo (she /her) is a cyber security professional, specialising in governance, risk and compliance, working on Whadjuk Noongar Boodja (Perth, Western Australia). She is currently the Trust Team Lead at Octopus Deploy, leading the implementation of their GRC programme. She has previously worked GRC roles across a variety of organisations and industries, including one of the world‚Äôs largest mining companies (sorry), finance, government, healthcare and telecommunications. She is passionate about providing pragmatic security advice, increasing diversity and inclusion in the Cyber Security industry, and Stardew Valley. She also has a degree in International Relations and a CISSP. You can find her on Twitter @intrepidrainbow.
